attributes.additional_details:
These recent Riots Prove it, Youths & People of all ages that have no morals and show A Blatant Disregard towards the rest of law-abiding society...they dont want to work for it they want to take it and this recentlly has showed us this!
Send the The individuals that are responsible for the acts of mindless Crime to work back in the Community IF THEY OLD ENOUGH I believe that if you're caught, then you should be draughted, no messing no appeal straight in, A year training then there's the enemy son go get em we'll even give you a bigger gun and some cover!! I'm fed up of seeing good brave men with young families lose their lives to protect the interests of self confessed street "soldiers" gun toting bmx riding hoody wearing dagger wielding drug addict rapists who have no value of life.no thought of consequence or compassion.
Put our foot down or let them continue to run a mock riot and ruin our country ..Or we can change it and make it better !!
